title: FB Live: Public Special on Holiday Gain, Maintain, or Lose Weight
itunes:title: FB Live: Public Special on Holiday Gain, Maintain, or Lose Weight
description:
Today, we’re going to talk about how to not freak the shit out, when it comes to weightloss for the holidays. What if I told you, you get to decide ahead of time whether you're going to gain weight, lose weight, or maintain weight this holiday season. This week, I’m getting you ready for the holidays, so you can finally choose something better than feeling afraid, unsure, and overwhelmed.

Get the Free Course Here: http://phit.click/freecourse
